name: There Are No Roads Ahead
description:
A Twine strategy-RPG game that emphasizes on strategic choices, character development, dialogue, and suspense.

Created for the CMPM 80K course at UC Santa Cruz.

Meet Haddon, Eva, Irick, and Alexander.

A crew of strong, smart, vigilant, and smooth-talking survivors trying to make a 1000-mile road-trip to a majestic, metropolitan fortress. Along the way, you'll be there to help decide how to deal with road obstacles, scavengers, militia, border patrols, and more.

Two party members are sent to investigate each situation, and it is up to you to decide which two will be most appropriate for the task. However, it's not that easy -- as each character has their own qualms, grudges, and values which may potentially clash with their partner and hamper their success.

Try playing it now in your browser!
